Control Name: 11.2.9 Clear desk and clear screen policy
Control Statement: A clear desk policy for papers and removable storage media anda clear screen policy for information processing facilities shall be adopted.

control_attributes.Control_Objective: 11.2.9 Clear desk and clear screen policy
control_attributes.description: A clear desk policy for papers and removable storage media anda clear screen policy for information processing facilities shall be adopted.
